name: Deathless (FireAnts Studio's)
description:
Buttons to Play :

  • Right button => you use the items in the lower right;  
  • Left button => to attack the; 
  • S => to shift; [do not hold down] 
  • E => to open/close inventory; 
  • Q => to pickup. 
  • Left/Right arrow => you move in the inventory of consumables, also the one at the bottom right;
